briefdescription.para: No trigger on a pin.
Low to high edge trigger.

Edge toggle trigger.

Triggering options.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* nrfx_gpiote_interrupt_handler_t) (nrfx_gpiote_pin_t pin, nrfx_gpiote_trigger_t trigger, void *p_context)
memberdef.name: nrfx_gpiote_interrupt_handler_t

briefdescription.para: Pin interrupt handler prototype.

parameterdescription.para: Trigger that led to this event.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if a GPIOTE input pin is set.

parameterdescription.para: The input pin is not set.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the GPIOTE driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
The driver is already initialized. Deprecated - use NRFX_ERROR_ALREADY instead.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the GPIOTE driver instance is initialized.

detaileddescription.para: The GPIOTE driver instance is a shared module. Therefore, check if the module is already initialized and skip initialization if it is.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the GPIOTE driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for allocating a GPIOTE channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function allocates the first unused GPIOTE channel from pool defined in NRFX_GPIOTE_APP_CHANNELS_MASK.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_alloc.
Routines that allocate and free the GPIOTE channels are independent from the rest of the driver. In particular, the driver does not need to be initialized when this function is called.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pointer to the GPIOTE channel that has been allocated.
There is no available channel to be used.

briefdescription.para: Function for freeing a GPIOTE channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function frees a GPIOTE channel that was allocated using nrfx_gpiote_channel_alloc.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_free.
Routines that allocate and free the GPIOTE channels are independent from the rest of the driver. In particular, the driver does not need to be initialized when this function is called.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the specified input pin and input event/interrupt.

detaileddescription.para: Prior to calling this function pin can be uninitialized or configured as input or output. However, following transitions and configurations are invalid and result in error returned by the function:

listitem.para: Setting level trigger (e.g. NRFX_GPIOTE_TRIGGER_HIGH) and using GPIOTE channel for the same pin.

Reconfiguring pin to input (p_config->p_pull_config not NULL) when pin was configured to use GPIOTE task. Prior to that, task must be disabled by configuring it with polarity set to NRF_GPIOTE_POLARITY_NONE.
Configuring trigger using GPIOTE channel for pin previously configured as output pin. Only sensing can be used for an output pin.

detaileddescription.para: Function can be used to configure trigger and handler for sensing input changes on an output pin. In that case, prior to that output pin must be configured with input buffer connected. In that case p_config->p_pull_config is NULL to avoid reconfiguration of the pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pointer to the structure with input pin configuration.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_gpiote_t const *p_instance, nrfx_gpiote_pin_t pin, nrfx_gpiote_output_config_t const *p_config, nrfx_gpiote_task_config_t const *p_task_config)
memberdef.name: nrfx_gpiote_output_configure

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the specified output pin to be used by the driver.

detaileddescription.para: Prior to calling this function pin can be uninitialized or configured as input or output. However, following transitions and configurations are invalid and result in error returned by the function:

listitem.para: Reconfiguring pin to output when pin was configured as input with trigger using GPIOTE channel. Prior to that, trigger must be disabled by configuring it as NRFX_GPIOTE_TRIGGER_NONE.
Configuring pin as output without input buffer connected when prior to that trigger was configured. In that case input buffer must be connected.
Configuring GPIOTE task for pin which was previously configured as input. Before using GPIOTE task pin must be configured as output by providing p_config.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pin configuration. If NULL pin configuration is not applied.
GPIOTE task configuration. If NULL task is not used.

briefdescription.para: Function for deinitializing the specified pin.

detaileddescription.para: Specified pin and associated GPIOTE channel are restored to the default configuration.

simplesect.para: GPIOTE channel used by the pin is not freed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pin not used by the driver.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling trigger for the given pin.

detaileddescription.para: When GPIOTE event is used trigger can be enabled without enabling interrupt, e.g. for PPI.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
True to enable the interrupt. Must be true when sensing is used.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling trigger for the given pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Set global callback called for each event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving Task/Event channel index associated with the given pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Location to write the channel index.
Pin is not configured or not using Task or Event.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving number of channels for specified GPIOTE instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: Number of channels for specified GPIOTE instance.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting a GPIOTE output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing a GPIOTE output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for toggling a GPIOTE output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling a GPIOTE output pin task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a GPIOTE output pin task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the OUT task for the specified output pin.

detaileddescription.para: The returned task identifier can be used within GPIOTE HAL, for example, to configure a DPPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: OUT task associated with the specified output pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the OUT task for the specified output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SET task for the specified output pin.

detaileddescription.para: The returned task identifier can be used within GPIOTE HAL, for example, to configure a DPPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: SET task associated with the specified output pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the SET task for the specified output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the CLR task for the specified output pin.

detaileddescription.para: The returned task identifier can be used within GPIOTE HAL, for example, to configure a DPPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: CLR task associated with the specified output pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the SET task for the specified output pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the GPIOTE event for the specified input pin.

detaileddescription.para: The returned event identifier can be used within GPIOTE HAL, for example, to configure a DPPI channel. If the pin is configured to use low-accuracy mode, the PORT event is returned.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: Event associated with the specified input pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of a GPIOTE input pin event.

detaileddescription.para: If the pin is configured to use low-accuracy mode, the address of the PORT event is returned.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified input pin event.

briefdescription.para: Function for forcing a specific state on the pin configured as task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering the task OUT manually.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering the task SET manually.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering the task CLR manually.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the latency mode for a given GPIOTE instance.

simplesect.para: Available for event mode with rising or falling edge detection on the pin. Toggle task mode can only be used with low latency mode setting.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the latency mode for a given GPIOTE instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating an instance of the GPIOTE driver.
Output pin default configuration.
Bitfield representing all GPIOTE channels available to the application for the specified GPIOTE instance.
Macro returning GPIOTE interrupt handler.
Input pin pull default configuration.
GPIO Task Event (GPIOTE) peripheral driver.
